    No, I'm just tired of this crap.  So stop with the whining like a little 
baby.  Learning JP has quit isn't helping my mood.  And your worthless 
e-mails that are not constructive aren't helping.

    So if you have a complaint, whine to the Council, not me directly.  The 
TM4 Driver is VOID until further notice.
